name: BBQ Chicken Wings
author: Patrick
summary: This yummy honey barbeque sauce is great on chicken wings, pork, or short ribs. The soy sauce and oyster sauce hint at an Asian inspiration, while the gin gives it an undeterminable edge.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded
directions: In a large bowl, mix the teriyaki sauce, oyster sauce, soy sauce, ketchup, garlic powder, gin, liquid smoke, and sugar
Place the chicken wings in the bowl, cover, and marinate in the refrigerator 8 hours or overnight
Preheat the grill for low heat
Arrange chicken on the grill, and discard the marinade
Grill the chicken wings on one side for 20 minutes, then turn and brush with honey
Continue grilling 25 minutes, or until juices run clear
